title: Find a Container for Customs Inspection
description: Customs authorities have ordered a physical inspection of a specific container. A planner must find it and arrange for it to be moved to the inspection area.

tasks.description: Receive the inspection order from customs for a specific container.
tasks.expected_outcome: Planner receives the notification for container ZZZZ1122334.

tasks.description: Find the container's current location in the yard.
tasks.expected_outcome: Planner locates the container in the TOS, noting it is at the bottom of a stack.

tasks.description: Create a series of work orders to 'dig out' the container and move it to the Customs Examination Station.
tasks.expected_outcome: Work orders are created for a yard crane to remove the containers on top and then move the target container to the inspection area.
